answerText: quorum sensing[10] The bacterium Vibrio fischeri uses quorum sensing to cause this enzyme to only be transcribed when population density is large to conserve energy. This enzyme is used in a wide variety of organisms to produce bioluminescence.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | Finals 2 | 19 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: N-acylhomoserine lactones and other autoinducers are used by Gram-negative bacteria to perform this process. For 10 points each: [10] Name this process which allows bacteria to coordinate their individual gene expression patterns based on population density.
